section.title: Console Alarms
section.para: These alarms show under the Console section of the &productname; &opscon;.

entry.para: Review logs in /var/log/ops-console and logs in /var/log/apache2. Restart ops-console by running the following commands on the &lcm;:
entry.screen: cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/ardana/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts ops-console-stop.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts ops-console-start.yml
